paper_title.ja: Simple method for removal of pollutants from water by freezing a portion of aquatic solution using a PET bottle, shredder scrap, and household freezer
paper_title.en: Simple method for removal of pollutants from water by freezing a portion of aquatic solution using a PET bottle, shredder scrap, and household freezer

ja.name: Hiroshi Moriwaki, Natsu Nishimura, Mahiro Oshima

en.name: Hiroshi Moriwaki, Natsu Nishimura, Mahiro Oshima

description.ja: 汚染物質が溶解した水をペットボトルに入れ、フタのある側を下にして保温材としてシュレッダーくずを用いて家庭用冷凍庫に入れる。シュレッダーくずに囲まれたフタの周辺部は凍結が遅れ、その液体部に汚染物質が濃縮される。この現象を利用して種々の汚染物質を水から90%以上、分離除去することに成功した。
description.en: The water with dissolved contaminants is placed in a plastic bottle, the lid side down, withshredder scrap used as a lagging material, and placed in a household freezer. The area around the lid, surrounded by theshredder scrap, freezes slower, and the contaminants are concentrated in the liquid. Using this phenomenon, we have succeeded in separating and removing over 90% of the contaminant from the water.

paper_title.ja: Pencil lead etched by plasma: Novel photonic material that can control the reflection from the visible to the infrared region
paper_title.en: Pencil lead etched by plasma: Novel photonic material that can control the reflection from the visible to the infrared region

ja.name: Tomoya Kamine, Yusuke Okada, Shouhei Koyama, Hiroshi Moriwaki

en.name: Tomoya Kamine, Yusuke Okada, Shouhei Koyama, Hiroshi Moriwaki, Pencil lead etched by plasma: Novel photonic material that can control the reflection from the visible to the infrared region, Optical Materials, 2024, 154, 115777.

description.ja: 鉛筆の芯にプラズマを照射することにより、可視光領域から赤外領域まで反射をコントロールできる新しい光学材料調製法を開発した。プラズマ照射時間を長くするほど、長波長側に反射スペクトルのピークがシフトした。このことを利用して、肉眼では全く読めないが、赤外線カメラを用いることによりはじめて読める文字を作ることに成功した。この方法は新たな情報管理技術などに応用が期待できる。
description.en: We developed a novel technique to prepare optical materials controled the reflection from visible to infrared region. The longer the plasma exposure time, the more the peak of the reflection spectrum red-shifted. Using this method, we succeeded in creating characters that are completely unreadable by the naked eye, but canbe read by using an infrared camera. This method is expected to be applied to new information management technologies.

paper_title.ja: Direct detection of dithiocarbamate fungicides by SALDI/MS using porous TiC ceramic powder as substrate
paper_title.en: Direct detection of dithiocarbamate fungicides by SALDI/MS using porous TiC ceramic powder as substrate

ja.name: Hiroshi Moriwaki, Issey Osaka, Kotaro Hashimoto, Osamu Yamada

en.name: Hiroshi Moriwaki, Issey Osaka, Kotaro Hashimoto, Osamu Yamada

description.ja: ジチオカーバメート系農薬は世界中で広く用いられている農薬であるが、溶媒に溶けにくい物性から、その分析は困難である。そこで、溶媒に溶解せず、固体状態で多孔質セラミックスと乳鉢で混ぜ合わせ、それをSALDI/TOF/MSにより測定することにより、質量分析を行った。結果、これまで検出が困難であったジチオカーバメート系農薬のマススペクトルを個別に得ることができた。
description.en: We developed a novel detection method for dithiocarbamate pesticides by SALDI/TOF/MS using porous TiC ceramics as a substrate. We successfully detected individual dithiocarbamates by this method and concluded that this method can be used for the analysis of dithiocarbamates by mass spectrometry.

paper_title.ja: Photoreduction of Cr(VI) by TiO2 adsorbed gold nanoparticles and perylene as a novel organic-inorganic hybrid photocatalyst
paper_title.en: Photoreduction of Cr(VI) by TiO2 adsorbed gold nanoparticles and perylene as a novel organic-inorganic hybrid photocatalyst

description.ja: 六価クロムを含む排水を光で連続的に処理する方法を開発した。ペリレンと金ナノ粒子を酸化チタン表面に付着させた粉末をアルギン酸カルシウムゲルビーズの中に分散させた。このビーズを充填したカラムを作成した。このカラムに光を照射しながら、六価クロムを含む排水（0.10 mM）を0.40 mL/minの流速で流した。結果、24時間連続して六価クロムを90%以上、還元しつづけることに成功した。
description.en: Successive reduction of Cr(VI) by photocatalytic reaction has been achieved. The TiO2 powder adsorbed with gold nanoparticles and perylene (Au/Pe/TiO2) was used as a photocatalyst. The powder was encapsulated in alginate calcium gel beads, and the beads were filled in a column. The Cr(VI) solution (0.10 mM) was flowed at 0.40 mL/min through the column and the column was irradiated by a UV lamp. The Cr(VI) was reduced by the photocatalytic reaction and the Cr(VI) concentration in the treated solution was successively over 90% for 24 h. Based on these results, we concluded that this method is useful for the water cleanup for the effluent from factories.

paper_title.ja: A collection device for various-sized microparticles that uses four serial acoustic separations: Working toward microplastic emission prevention
paper_title.en: A collection device for various-sized microparticles that uses four serial acoustic separations: Working toward microplastic emission prevention

ja.name: Tatsuki Jonai, Yuimaru Ohori, Tadahiko Fujii, Akemi Nakayama, Hiroshi Moriwaki, Yoshitake Akiyama

description.ja: 音響収束法により水中のマイクロプラスチック粒子を分離する方法が改良した。4つの音響収束装置を直列に連続につなげたシステムを開発した。この装置により、水中のマイクロプラスチックを約100倍濃縮することに成功した。この技術は洗濯排水からのマイクロプラスチックの除去に貢献するだろう。
description.en: A method for separating microplastic particles in water by acoustic focusing method is improved. We have developed a system in which four acoustic focusing devices are connected in series. With this device, we succeeded in concentrating microplastics in water about 100 times. This technology will contribute to the removal of microplastics from laundry wastewater.

paper_title.ja: “Plasma-structural coloring” of penciling on a paper
paper_title.en: “Plasma-structural coloring” of penciling on a paper

description.ja: 紙の上の鉛筆で書いた部分をプラズマ照射により種々の色に色づける手法を開発した。紙の上の鉛筆層が十分、分厚くないと種々の色を発色させられないことが分かった。そのためにグラファイトの成分が高いこと、十分に塗り浸けていることなどが必要であった。
description.en: We have developed a method of coloring pencil-written parts on paper in various colors by plasma irradiation. The pencil layer on the paper must be thick to form the various structural colors. Therefore, it was necessary to use a pencil containing high graphite component and to be sufficiently painted pencil lead component on the paper sample.

paper_title.ja: Interaction between nanoplastics and pectin, a water-soluble polysaccharide, in the presence of Fe(III) ion
paper_title.en: Interaction between nanoplastics and pectin, a water-soluble polysaccharide, in the presence of Fe(III) ion

description.ja: ポリスチレンナノ粒子とペクチンの相互作用について検討した。鉄(III)イオン共存下でペクチンによりポリスチレンナノ粒子が凝集沈殿を起こすことを明らかにした。これは環境中におけるナノプラスチックの挙動についての情報を与えるばかりでなく、ナノプラスチック除去法の開発につながる結果である。
description.en: Interaction between polystyrene nanoparticles and pectin has been studied. Flocculation of nanoplastics was occurred by the addition of pectin and Fe(III). This result contributes to the understanding of the behavior of nanoplastics in the water environment and the development of the method to remove nanoplastic from water.

paper_title.ja: Structural color on pencil lead formed by plasma etching

ja.name: Hiroshi Moriwaki, Tomoya Kamine, Yukari Kawabe, Yusuke Okada

description.ja: 鉛筆の芯にプラズマを照射するという簡易な手法で構造色を作ることに成功した。照射時間により発色をコントロールすることが可能であり、プラズマインディケーターやカラープリンターなどへの応用が期待される。

paper_title.ja: 裾花川の石油湧出地点より単離したバクテリア(Acinetobacter beijerinckii susohanaR)の石油分解能
paper_title.en: 裾花川の石油湧出地点より単離したバクテリア(Acinetobacter beijerinckii susohanaR)の石油分解能

en.name: 森脇 洋, 藤井朱瑞, 伊藤 隆, 野村隆臣

ja.name: 森脇 洋, 藤井朱瑞, 伊藤 隆, 野村隆臣

description.ja: 信州大学環境科学年報
description.en: An oil-degrading bacterium was isolated from the soil of the oil-leaching site at the bottom of Susohana River in Nagano, Japan. The spherical bacterium (susohanaR) could glow in the culture medium containing Bunker A as an only nutrient source. The 16S rRNA phylogenetic analysis, bacterial morphology observation, and physiological test were used for the identification and classification of the bacterium. The bacterium showed greatest similarity with Acinetobacter beijerinckii by 16S rRNA. The shape and several results of physiological tests were different between the standard strain of Acinetobacter beijerinckii and the isolated strain. Based on the result of the next generation DNA sequence, we conclude that the strain is a novel variant strain of Acinetobacter beijerinckii, that is, Aceinetobacter beijerinckii strain susohanaR. The rate of degradation for n-alkanes in light-oil, the rate of degradation of 81.9% was observed after 6 days of cultivation. The strain revealed high emulsification activity and bio-surfactant productivity through the cultivation.

paper_title.en: Removal of polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons from soil using a composite material containing iron and activated carbon in the freeze-dried calcium alginate matrix: Novel soil cleanup technique

description.en: A novel clean-up technology to remove polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) from solid samples by magnetic separation using a composite containing iron powder as a magnetic material and activated carbon as an adsorbent in the freeze-dried calcium alginate matrix (Fe-AC-alg) has been developed. The Fe-AC-alg powder (50 mg), mixed with 1.0 g of glass beads having 12 kinds of adsorbed PAHs, was shaken without adding solvents at 300 rpm. After shaking, the Fe-AC-alg powder was separated using a permanent magnet. The quantity of the PAHs extracted from the glass beads treated by this method was determined. The removal (%) of the PAHs was over 96%. A roadside soil sample (10 g) was mixed with the Fe-AC-alg (1.0 g) for 2 weeks. The removal (%) of benzo[a]pyrene from the sample by the presented technique was 78%. The toxic equivalent concentration (Σ BaPeq) for the sample decreased from 0.27 to 0.10 mg kg−1 by this method. The presented method is very simple, economical, and environment-friendly.

paper_title.en: Application of porous TiC ceramic powder as a substrate for the surface-assisted laser desorption/ionization mass spectrometry to detection of environmental pollutants

description.en: Porous TiC ceramic powder was used as a novel substrate for the surface-assisted laser desorption/ionization mass spectrometry (SALDI-MS) analysis of various environmental pollutants. The porous TiC ceramic powder has a nano-structural morphology with a high surface area, an electrical conductivity, and a photoabsorption at the Nd:YAG laser band of 355 nm. These properties of the porous TiC ceramics suggest having a good compatibility as a substrate for SALDI-MS. Furthermore, the porous TiC ceramic powder can be used as an adsorbent for environmental pollutants. The porous TiC ceramic powder was added to a perfluorooctane sulfonate (PFOS) aqueous solution. The liquid was shaken for 2 h, and PFOS was adsorbed onto the TiC ceramics. The liquid was filtered, and the residue was dried. The obtained powder was fixed on a carbon tape and measured by SALDI-MS in the negative ion mode. As a result, the peak assignable to PFOS (C8F17SO3 −) was detected, and no other significant peaks at m/z 100–500 were observed. As for the other analytes, the ion peaks corresponding to the anions or cations derived from these compounds in the negative or positive ion mode were observed using the same treatments.

paper_title.en: Evaluation of the Interaction between Pesticides and a Cell Membrane Model by Surface Plasmon Resonance Spectroscopy Analysis

description.en: A surface plasmon resonance (SPR) spectroscopy analysis was used for the characterization of the interaction between pesticides and a cell membrane model. A liposome was immobilized onto the surface of the SPR sensor chip (L1), and the lipid bilayer membrane formed on the sensor chip was regarded as the cell membrane model. The solution containing a pesticide was flowed onto the sensor chip, and an SPR sensorgram, which reflected the interaction between the pesticide and the lipid bilayer membrane, was obtained. As the results, the pattern and strength of the interaction of the pesticides with the cell membrane model were visualized and quantified. Triflumizole, hexythiazox, and pentachlorophenol showed a strong interaction with the lipid bilayer. It is well-known that triflumizole and pentachlorophenol interact with the membrane and reveal toxicities for cell membranes. In addition, there was a tendency for higher residual ratios to be observed when the no observable adverse effect level (NOAEL) values for chronic toxicity (1 year toxicity study in dogs) were lower. We suggest that a novel parameter for the evaluation or presumption of the behaviors and chronic toxicities of pesticides is obtained by the presented method.

publication_name.en: JOURNAL OF AGRICULTURAL AND FOOD CHEMISTRY

paper_title.ja: Photodegradation of environmental pollutants using perylene adsorbed on silica gel as a visible-light photocatalyst
paper_title.en: Photodegradation of environmental pollutants using perylene adsorbed on silica gel as a visible-light photocatalyst

ja.name: Hiroshi Moriwaki, Yasutaka Akaishi, Michiya Akamine, Hisanao Usami

description.ja: 太陽エネルギーを利用した水の浄化法を開発すべく、太陽の光に応答する新しい光触媒(ペリレンをシリカゲル上に担持させた材料：Pe/SiO2)を開発した。この触媒により、水中に存在する染料の一種であるメチルオレンジや残留性の高い有機汚染物質であるペンタクロロフェノール、ミツバチが巣からいなくなるという現象（蜂群崩壊症候群）の原因物質の一つとして考えられているイミダクロプリドを太陽光により分解できた。
description.en: Decomposition of several environmental pollutants in water using perylene adsorbed on silica gel (Pe/SiO2 powder) as a photocatalyst under the visible-light irradiation have been studied. The Pe/SiO2 powder was prepared by mixing a toluene solution of the perylene with silica gel followed by evaporating the toluene. Irradiation by visible light (>420nm) of the methyl orange aqueous solution with the Pe/SiO2 powder in the presence of ascorbic acid resulted in the decomposition of the methyl orange. The rate of decrease of the methyl orange reached 99% by visible light irradiation for 20 min. The reaction also occurred by the irradiation of sunlight. In addition, the irradiation of visible light also led to the decomposition of imidacloprid using Pe/SiO2 in the presence of ascorbic acid. Furthermore, irradiation by visible light (>420 nm) of a pentachlorophenol aqueous solution with the Pe/SiO2 powder resulted in the decomposition of the pentachlorophenol. The possible mechanisms of these reactions are discussed. (C) 2016 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Electrochemical extraction of gold from wastes as nanoparticles stabilized by phospholipids

description.en: A simple one-step method for the extraction of gold from wastes as nanoparticles stabilized by phospholipids is demonstrated. This is achieved by applying an AC voltage for 5 s to the gold-containing wastes, which act as the electrodes in a buffer solution containing a dispersed phospholipid (1,2-dioleoyl-snglycero-3-phosphocholine, DOPC). This is an environmentally friendly and rapid method for recovering gold from wastes. The extracted gold nanoparticles have significant potential as a catalyst or biomedical material. (C) 2016 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Electrospray ionization mass spectrometric detection of low polar compounds by adding NaAuCl4

description.en: Liquid chromatography electrospray ionization mass spectrometry (LC/ESI/MS) has been widely used for various analyses. However, it is difficult to use LC/ESI/MS for the analysis of low polar compounds, such as polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons. It is well known that AuCl4- ion decomposes to AuCl3 by heating, and AuCl3 is a strong pi-electrophilic Lewis acid. Low polar compounds (pyrene, benzo[a]pyrene, perylene, benzo[ghi]perylene, dibenzothiophene and pi-dimethoxybenzene) were detected by ESI/MS in the positive ion mode by adding NaAuCl4. The low polar compound interacts with AuCl3 formed at the ESI interface, and undergoes electron transfer to AuCl3. The radical cation of the low polar compound was then detected by MS. In addition, the LC/ESI/MS determination of polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons by the post-column addition of NaAuCl4 was studied. (C) 2016 The Authors Journal of Mass Spectrometry Published by John Wiley & Sons Ltd

description.en: Various influences of environmental pollutants on living organism and environmental problems were reviewed.

ja.name: H. Itoh (Editor), Y. Yoshida, Y. Ishii, Y. Ito, M.Uebori, K. Kawata, M. Takino, A. Hasegawa, H. Fukui, M. Murakami, H. Moriwaki, J. Yonekubo and S.Suzuki

en.name: H. Itoh (Editor), Y. Yoshida, Y. Ishii, Y. Ito, M.Uebori, K. Kawata, M. Takino, A. Hasegawa, H. Fukui, M. Murakami, H. Moriwaki, J. Yonekubo and S.Suzuki

description.ja: 不法投棄廃棄物はどのような化学物質を含んでいるか想像がつかないが、環境に悪影響を与えないかどうかを確認するために分析する必要性がある。正体の不明な物質を分析するには非常な危険性を伴う。そこで、どのような方法論で不法投棄廃棄物中の環境汚染物質を分析すればいいのか、とくにLC/MSをどのように応用できるかに焦点をあてて、その方法論を構築した。
description.en: What kind of chemical substances may be contained in illegally disposed wastes can not be known; however in order to verify their environmental safety, there is much need for them to be analyzed. Since the analysis of unidentified substances can beextremely dangerous, the methodology for analyzing the environmental pollutants among illegally disposed wastes has been established. It is especially structured with the emphasis on how to apply LC/MS.

description.en: The molecular imprinting is explained. The molecular imprinting polymer makes a template of a molecular by a polymer, and it adsorbs such molecular specifically. It also possesses the reactivity of enzymes. Thus, its future development not only in the analytical chemistry, but also in the synthetic chemistry is to be expected. The fundamentals of molecular imprinting materials, preparation methods, and application are described with the comments on its future developments.

research_project_title.ja: 枯草菌遺伝子操作株を滅菌・凍結乾燥させた粉体によるレアメタルの抽出法の開発
research_project_title.en: Application of freeze-dried powders of genetically engineered microbial strains as adsorbents for rare earth metal ions

offer_organization.en: Japan Society for the Promotion of Science

description.ja: 希土類金属・金イオンの回収・分離に枯草菌遺伝子操作株をフリーズドライさせて得られた粉末を利用することを本研究の目的とした。希土類金属イオンの抽出には細胞壁加水分解酵素欠損株が、分離には壁テイコ酸欠損株がそれぞれ野生株より有用だった。次にD-アラニン修飾欠損株およびグルコース修飾欠損株を遺伝子操作により新たに構築し、得られた粉末による希土類金属イオン吸着挙動を検討した結果、いずれも野生株よりも高い吸着能を示した。また、塩化金酸イオンの吸着では、WTA株が最も高い吸着能を示した。遺伝子操作株のフリーズドライ粉末を吸着剤に適用した事例はほとんどなく、生物資源の新たな活用手法を提示できた。
description.en: The adsorption behaviors of rare earth metal or chlorauric ions onto freeze-dried powders of genetically-engineered microbial strains were studied. The cell wall hydrolases-defective strain was suitable for the extraction of rare earth metal ions. The wall teichoic acid-defective strain was useful for the separation of rare earth metal ions and the extraction of chlorauric ion. The rare earth ion adsorption ability for the powders of glucose modification-defective, D-alanine modification-defective, and glucose plus D-alanine modification-defective strains were higher than that of wild type. These results of this study indicate that there is a possibility that modifications of the teichoic acids control the adsorption of the metal ions onto the cell walls and will be of help when microbial cells are applied as an adsorbent for metal ions.
